MOMA & Alternative New York Exhibitions

  1. Home
  2. Exhibition

Title: A Century of Modern Drawing, 1881–1981

Date

Mon Mar 01 1982 until Tue Mar 16 1982

Location

Venue: British Museum

Artists and other Influencers

Carl Andre (1935-)Jean (Hans) Arp (1886-1966)Umberto Boccioni (1882-1916)Constantin Brancusi (1876-1957)Georges Braque (1882-1963)Marc Chagall (1887-1985)Giorgio de Chirico (1888-1978)Paul Cézanne (1839-1906)Stuart Davis (1892-1964)Hilaire-Germain-Edgar Degas (1834-1917)Robert Delaunay (1885-1941)André Derain (1880-1954)Jim Dine (1935-)Otto Dix (1891-1969)Theo van Doesburg (Christian Emil Marie Küpper) (1883-1931)Arthur Dove (1880-1946)Jean Dubuffet (1901-1985)Max Ernst (1891-1976)Sam Francis (1923-1994)Paul Gauguin (1848-1903)Vincent van Gogh (1853-1890)Arshile Gorky (1904-1948)Juan Gris (1887-1927)George Grosz (1893-1959)Erich Heckel (1883-1970)Jasper Johns (1930-)Vasily Kandinsky (1866-1944)Paul Klee (1879-1940)František Kupka (1871-1957)Sol LeWitt (1928-2007)Bart Van Der Leck (1876-1958)El Lissitzky (1890-1941)Fernand Léger (1881-1955)Kazimir Malevich (1878-1935)Man Ray (1890-1976)Agnes Martin (1912-2004)André Masson (1896-1987)Henri Matisse (1869-1954)Joan Miró (1893-1983)Piet Mondrian (1872-1944)Robert Motherwell (1915-1991)Bruce Nauman (1941-)Emil Nolde (1867-1956)Claes Oldenburg (1929-)Francis Picabia (1879-1953)Pablo Picasso (1881-1973)Jackson Pollock (1912-1956)Robert Rauschenberg (1925-2008)Odilon Redon (1840-1916)Dorothea Rockburne (1932-)Georges Rouault (1871-1958)Oskar Schlemmer (1888-1943)Kurt Schwitters (1887-1948)Georges-Pierre Seurat (1859-1891)Gino Severini (1883-1966)Charles Sheeler (1883-1965)Yves Tanguy (1900-1955)Vladimir Tatlin (1885-1953)Willem de Kooning (1904-1997)
